text: Avoid the Dell G7 15 7590 Gaming Laptop 15.6" Display Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA RTX 2060 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD 8GB RAM Windows 10 Home if you can. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the Dell G7 15 7590 Gaming Laptop 15.6" Display Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA RTX 2060 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD 8GB RAM Windows 10 Home if you can. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. Fans get extremely loud, like a jet engine.. Looking to return it.

Avoid the Dell G7 15 7590 Gaming Laptop 15.6" Display Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA RTX 2060 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD 8GB RAM Windows 10 Home if you can. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Dell G7 15 7590 Gaming Laptop 15.6" Display Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA RTX 2060 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD 8GB RAM Windows 10 Home. It blue screens occasionally frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The trackpad has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Dell G7 15 7590 Gaming Laptop 15.6" Display Intel i7-8750H NVIDIA RTX 2060 128GB SSD + 1TB HDD 8GB RAM Windows 10 Home. It overheats frequently when playing Fortnite, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
